data.name: AllParticipantsViewModel_DisplayName
data.comment: The display name of an AllParticipantsViewModel object

data.name: Blowtrial_ProjectName
data.comment: The name of the project to be displayed in the main window

data.name: CloudDirectoryVm_DataCollectingSite
data.comment: Drop down list option for site which backs up TO cloud

data.name: CloudDirectoryVm_DataReceivingSite
data.comment: Drop down list option for site which oversees data

data.name: CloudDirectoryVm_SelectDir
data.comment: Title for dialog to select cloud directory

data.name: CloudDirectory_Error_DirectoryNotFound
data.value: The specified directory is not found
data.comment: Error message when cloud directory is not found

data.name: CloudDirectory_Error_IntervalOutOfRange
data.value: The backup interval must be between 1 minute and 1 day
data.comment: Error message when backup interval is out of range

data.name: CloudDirectory_Error_StringLengthTooLong
data.value: The cloud directory must be less than 1024 characters
data.comment: Error message when cloud directory string is too long (1024)

data.name: DateTime_Error_DateEmpty
data.comment: Error Message for when the date field is null

data.name: DateTime_Error_Date_DateTimeEmpty
data.comment: Error Message for when both the date and time fields are null

data.name: DateTime_Error_Date_MustComeAfter
data.value: The date must not be before {0}
data.comment: The error message when a date must comes after another date

data.name: DateTime_Error_Date_MustComeBefore
data.value: The date must not be after {0}
data.comment: The error message when a date must comes before another date

data.name: DateTime_Error_TimeEmpty
data.comment: Error Message for when the time field is null

data.name: DateTime_Now
data.comment: The word representing now (current date and time)

data.name: DateTime_Today
data.comment: The word representing today (current date)

data.name: Date_Error_OutOfRange
data.value: The date must be AFTER the date of birth and prior to the current date & time
data.comment: Generic error message when a date is before the date of birth or after the current date/time

data.name: DropDownList_Error_BoolNull
data.comment: Drop down list error when null is selected on a required field

data.name: DropDownList_False
data.comment: Drop down list generic false option

data.name: DropDownList_NotSpecified
data.comment: The null option for a drop down list

data.name: DropDownList_PleaseSelect
data.comment: Drop down list option to ask user to select an option

data.name: DropDownList_True
data.comment: Drop down list generic true option

data.name: Field_Error_Empty
data.comment: Generic error message when a text field is null

data.name: MainWindowViewModel_Command_Login
data.comment: Display name for command which displays login window

data.name: MainWindowViewModel_Command_RegisterNewPatient
data.comment: Display name for the command that allows the user to enrol a new patient (combined screening and registration).

data.name: MainWindowViewModel_Command_ViewParticipants
data.comment: Display name for the command that shows all customers.

data.name: MainWindowViewModel_Command_ViewScreened
data.comment: Display name for the command that allows the user to view screend patients

data.name: MainWindowViewModel_WorkspaceName
data.comment: Title of the main window

data.name: MessageBox_ConfirmClear
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear data entered (without saving)
data.comment: the confirmation message when clearing data on a form

data.name: MessageBox_Warning
data.comment: The title for warning level message boxes

data.name: NewPatientVM_Centile
data.comment: Display for the weight for age centile. P refers to % & 2 to decimal places

data.name: NewPatientVM_DisplayName
data.comment: Display name for the title of the new patient window.

data.name: NewPatientVM_Error_DuplicateEnrol
data.value: A patient has already been enrolled with this hospital identifier
data.comment: Error message for when the hospital identifier is already found in the enrolled patients table

data.name: NewPatientVM_Error_DuplicateScreen
data.value: A patient has already been screened with this hospital identifier
data.comment: Error message for when the hospital identifier is already found in the screened patients table

data.name: NewPatientVM_Error_SiblingIdEmpty
data.value: Please enter the study number of the enrolled twin
data.comment: Error message for when the study number is blank for the sibling ID, but the user has confirmed the patient has an enrolled sibling

data.name: NewPatientVM_Error_SiblingNotFound
data.value: No participant can be found with the specified study number
data.comment: Drop down list option for

data.name: NewPatient_BCGgiven
data.comment: Drop down list option for BCG already given

data.name: NewPatient_BCGnotGiven
data.comment: Drop down list option for BCG NOT given

data.name: NewPatient_ConsentObtained
data.comment: Drop down list option for written consent obtained

data.name: NewPatient_ConsentRefused
data.comment: Drop down list option for refusal of consent

data.name: NewPatient_Error_ConsentIrrelevant
data.value: Consent status is irrelevant for this patient
data.comment: Error message for when a consent status is given, but patient is not eligible to be enrolled

data.name: NewPatient_Error_ConsentRequired
data.value: Please enter whether consent was obtained
data.comment: Error message for when consent is required but no value is entered

data.name: NewPatient_Error_DOBafterNow
data.value: Patient must be born BEFORE the current date & time
data.comment: Error message for when a Customer is missing a last name.

data.name: NewPatient_Error_DOBtooOldToScreen
data.value: Patients cannot be screened after 180 days since birth
data.comment: Error message for when the Date of Birth is over 180 days from current date

data.name: NewPatient_Error_InvalidGestation
data.value: Gestational Age must be between 24 and 43 weeks
data.comment: Error message for when a Customer is missing an e-mail address.

data.name: NewPatient_Error_InvalidHospitalIdentifier
data.comment: Error message for when a Hospital Identifier is does not fit the specified format

data.name: NewPatient_Error_InvalidWeight
data.value: Weight must be between 350 and 1999 grams
data.comment: Error message for when an admission weight is not between 350 and 1999 grams

data.name: NewPatient_Error_MissingDiagnosis
data.comment: Error message for when a Customer is missing a first name.

data.name: NewPatient_Error_NoGA
data.value: Please enter the gestational age in weeks
data.comment: Error message when both gestation weeks and days are null

data.name: NewPatient_Error_NoGAdaysOnly
data.value: Please enter the gestational age in days
data.comment: Error message when gestation days is null

data.name: NewPatient_Error_NoGAdaysSuffix
data.comment: Error message when gestation weeks is null

data.name: NewPatient_Gender_Female
data.comment: Drop down list option for female

data.name: NewPatient_Gender_Male
data.comment: Drop down list option for male

data.name: NewPatient_IsLikelyDie24
data.comment: Drop down list option is expected to survive > 24hr

data.name: NewPatient_NotLikelyDie24
data.value: Expected to survive more than 24 hours
data.comment: Drop down list option NOT expected to survive 24hr

data.name: NewPatient_SuccesfullyRandomised
data.comment: Caption on messagebox when succesfully randomised

data.name: NewPatient_ToControl
data.value: {0} has been randomised to the CONTROL arm with an ID of {1:n0}.
data.comment: String format display message when randomised to control arm

data.name: NewPatient_ToIntervention
data.value: {0} has been randomised to the INTERVENTION arm ({1}) with an ID of {2:n0}.
data.comment: String format display message when randomised to intervention arm

data.name: ParticipantModel_Describe_DateTimeDischarge
data.comment: The description of the date/time of discharge field

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_BcgAdverseDetailRequired
data.value: Please enter details of the BCG reaction
data.comment: Error message when an adverse reaction to BCG is present, but no details provided

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_CauseOfDeathDataRequired
data.value: Please enter details about the cause of death
data.comment: Error message when cause of death is -other- but no details provided

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_CauseOfDeathRequired
data.value: Please enter the cause of death
data.comment: Error message when the patient is known to have died, but no reason is given

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_LastWeightChange
data.value: The weight has changed too dramatically from birth ({0}g)
data.comment: The error when the last weight is less than 50% of birth weight

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_RegistrationDate
data.value: the date of enrolment in the study
data.comment: the description of date of enrolment in study

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_RegistrationDateTime
data.value: the time of enrolment in the study
data.comment: the description of time of enrolment in study

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_WeightAfterLastContact
data.value: The date of last weight cannot be after the date of death or last known contact
data.comment: The error message when The date of last weight date is after the date of death or last known contact

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_WeightNotFound
data.value: Please enter the weight in grams
data.comment: Error message when weight is missing

data.name: ParticipantUpdateView_Label_28days
data.comment: the branch for day 28

data.name: ParticipantUpdateView_Label_Death
data.comment: The branch for time of death

data.name: ParticipantUpdateView_Label_DeathDateTime
data.comment: The label when DeathTimeOrLastContactDate refers to death

data.name: ParticipantUpdateView_Label_Discharge
data.comment: The branch for time of discharge

data.name: ParticipantUpdateView_Label_LastContactDateTime
data.comment: The label when DeathTimeOrLastContactDate refers to last contact

data.comment: Description of control arm

data.name: ParticipantUpdateVM_InterventionArm

data.name: ParticipantUpdateView_Label_Weight
data.comment: Stem for last weight question

data.comment: Display name when updating participant

data.value: The patient can not be alive at 28 days until the patient is 28 days of age

data.value: Discharged and known to have survived

data.value: Must be less than {0} characters long

data.value: The trial will commence with this installation

data.value: Patients have been randomised by envelope

data.value: Cannot retrospectively add data unless site is a data collecting site

data.value: Sites must have perceptually different colours

data.value: There is an error in 1 of the selected direcories (hover mouse for details)

data.value: At least 1 study site must be nominated

data.name: NewPatientModel_Error_NoStudyCentre
data.value: A study site must be selected for this patient

data.comment: The header refering to the steps of the process eg, step 1 - enter your site's name

data.name: StudySitesModel_Error_DuplicateId
data.value: Each site identifier must be unique

data.value: Value must be an exact multiple of {0}

data.value: The mask can only contain characters [0 9 # L ? A a & C . > < ! \ "]

data.value: The mask must not be more than {0} characters long

data.value: That name is already in use

data.name: Field_Error_TooShort
data.value: Must be at least {0} characters long

data.value: Both weight and gender do not match the envelope number

data.value: The gender is incorrect for that envelope

data.name: NewPatientModel_Error_EnvelopeNotFound
data.value: No envelope is labeled with that number

data.name: NewPatientModel_Error_EnvelopeWeightIncorrect
data.value: The patient's weight is incorrect for that envelope

data.value: This step cannot be undone. Click OK only if all patients randomised by envelope have been entered into the 'New Patient' form.

data.name: NewPatientModel_Error_IdOutOfRangeForSite
data.value: Id numbers for this site must be between {0} and {1}

data.name: NewPatientViewModel_Error_EnvelopeInDb
data.value: Details for that envelope number have already been entered

data.name: StudySitesModel_Error_OverlappingIdRanges
data.value: The Id range overlaps with the Id range for another site

data.name: StudySiteDataModel_Error_BackgroundAndErrorMatch
data.value: The background colour must contrast with the error colour (red)

data.name: StudySiteDataModel_Error_TextAndBackgroundMatch
data.value: The text colour must contrast with the background colour

data.name: NewPatientViewModel_SoftError_Envelope
data.value: There is a problem with the envelope ({0}). Click OK to continue (and a major protocol violation will be automatically logged), or click cancel and correct any errors.

data.name: NewPatient_Error_DOBtooOldToRandomise
data.value: The patient must be less than 22 days old at the time of randomising

data.name: NewPatient_Error_TwinAndEnvelope
data.value: A randomising envelope should not be used for this twin. Id will be auto assigned.

data.name: NewPatient_Error_TwinGestAge
data.value: A twin of that patient would be expected to have a gestation of {0} weeks

data.name: CreateCsvModel_Error_NoDateQuotes
data.value: If date contains a comma, dates must be in quotes or seperated by another character

data.value: Please only give BCG & OPV once nearing discharge from hospital.

data.name: RandomisedMessagesViewModel_DefaultIntervention
data.value: Please give BCG & OPV as soon as possible.

data.name: NewPatient_Error_InvalidGestationDays
data.value: Please enter a value between 0 and 6 days

data.name: RandomisedMessagesViewModel_DefaultDischarge_NICU
data.value: Discharge from NICU or Level 2 Nursery

data.name: ViolationTypeOption_MajorWrongAllocation
data.value: Major - Randomised on incorrect weight or gender

data.name: BackupService_DBupdateRequestExplanation
data.value: A request has been recieved to update the database with information entered by a trial oversight computer. Please save any changes, and then logout or close the application.

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_BcgRequiredForAdverse
data.value: Please enter the details of when the BCG was given

data.name: ParticipantUpdateVM_Warning_BcgInControl
data.value: BCG given to a patient in the control arm! A violation {0} logged.

data.name: VaccineAdministeredVM_DualBcg
data.value: Only 1 type of BCG can be given per patient

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_Bcg28daysDead
data.value: The patient cannot have a BCG papule at 28 days if he/she died before day 28

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_Bcg28daysNoOutcome
data.value: The patient cannot have a BCG papule at 28 days if the 28 day outcome is unknown

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_Bcg28daysNotElapsed
data.value: The patient cannot have a BCG papule at 28 days until they are 28 days of age

data.name: ParticipantModel_Error_BcgNeitherDischOrDead
data.value: The patient can only have a value for BCG papule at death, discharge if one of these events has occurred
